content: stitch or 3 needle bind off technique weave in ends soak and block if desired now grab a tea or coffee your favourite book and get ready to cast on sock number two 5 © the kitchen sink shop abbreviations k knit p purl n - needle ssk slip 1 stitch knit wise onto right needle slip another stitch knit wise onto right needle then knit the two stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one stitch p2tog purl 2 stitches together as one stitch s1 knitwise - slip one stitch knit wise with yarn held in back s1 purl wise - slip one stitch purl wise with yarn held in front rs right side of work ws wrong side of work questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i d love to see your library socks tag me @thekitchensinkshop #librarysocks 6 © the kitchen sink shop
